favourite.article: Thank you God, the cross it nailed for me. Thanks the blood she'd for me. I love you, always, no matter what comes my way, only you Lord. FOREVER AMEN
Thank You Lord for dying for us. Thank You for opening up the way for us to know You and to love You more!
I sang this lovely song in the home meetings. Thank You Lord for dying for us.
I love this. It 's heavenly & ministers to my spirit.
Every day we wake up we love to come to You, Lord!
Our Father bless us and keep us in Your loving care and forgive for our sins. We need You God more than ever. Thank You for Your Son the Lamb. Oh God thank You in Jesus Christ's name I pray.

Thanks to God. He saves my life everyday and He teaches the prayer to pray for my brothers and sisters on the earth. My brothers and sisters, please pray for those who ignore you or in your life and give your love; forgive whatever they have done, say God bless you with me as well as you.
Thank You! Jesus :-)
Amen, we need to thank the Lord that He becomes our life supply, for us to grow and to consummate the New Jerusalem.
Lord Jesus I love You!

Oh Lord Jesus Your words are true. I will daily come to Your presence to be supplied with Your life. I will declare my love to my Lover each morning. Oh Lord I don't want to miss this private, personal, spiritual, intimate and affectionate time. Oh Lord Jesus, Amen.
I love Jesus as His grace is always with me all the time. His blood has opened many gates before me in my life and with Him I am still going to open all the steel gates before me.

I too, am thankful to Jesus for everything and for paying for my sins with His blood. I keep trying to tell the Good News to my relatives but they just write me off like "yea, yea". I suppose that's because they are J-witnesses and I am a Christian who follows the Bible. I can't make them understand; for God so loved the world... that whosoever believes in His name etc. I will keep praying and trying. Wish me luck. Thanks.

Brothers and sisters, we all need to come to the Lord and be supplied by His Word, declaring that we love Him every morning, having a sweet fellowship with Him. May the Lord preserve our hearts in Christ. Amen!

Thank You, Lord Jesus, for loving me and dying for me. Becoming our life, life supply, the true meaning of comfort, peace and serenity. You are so precious. You are worthy of our loves and praises. Praise You, Lord Jesus.

Oh Lord Jesus, I love You. Oh You're precious to me. I'll love You forever. You are the only one for me! There are no words to describe how thankful and amazed I am at how how much the Lord loves me. We as humans chose somthing and love or like it for a day or two then we hate it, but Lord chooses something and loves it eternally, and even though we sinned so many times He still loves us and is still here for us. Oh we have such a faithful God! Oh Lord I love You!

No words are enough to say how I thank and praise the Lord for dying in order for me to live. Oh, Lord Jesus thank You for Your love; thank You for shedding Your blood for me to be saved from eternal perdition. Cause me daily, every morning to come to You and enjoy as my life supply, as my real satisfaction, as my all in all, so I can overcome the day with You. Lord Jesus, continually captivate me with Your beauty and soften my heart, so that I WILL ALWAYS BE IN LOVE WITH YOU, forever and ever, Amen.
Wonderful song, this song remind me how Jesus has died for our redemption. Thanks for the grace God has given. Bless all.

Amen!! How precious our God is! Praise the Lord for His great love toward us. No one could match Him. No one can compare to Him. What we need the most is not honor and wealth but to gain the Lord Himself!! If we have Him we have everything!! Hallelujah. Attract us more by Your beauty Lord.
If we have seen how matchless and priceless He is we will not ask for anything else but HIm. We will love Him forever until His coming back when we will see Him face to face.
Whenever I like something or someone, I listen to this song, and I just realize that I should just love the Lord. Then He'll cover everything for us.

I like this hymn because it reminds me of how our matchless and priceless Lord truly loves us that He willingly died on our behalf. It also makes me realize that everything in our Christian life is not by our own effort, it is by our daily enjoyment of His presence by practically coming to His word in the morning to be revived and enjoy His sweet dispensing into our being. It is by this dispensing that we are strengthened to live the Christian life.
Lord, truly You are the precious and matchless One! Thank You Lord for willingly dying for us to wash us and justify us. Lord keep us in Your presence, teach us to abide in You daily.
Jesus I love You very much, You are everything. Sorry my English is not that good. I can't see my life without YOU.

Brethren we always thank God at all times because He died for us to redeem us from our transgression. First we are a cursed people but of His great love to us He offered His life as a pleasing aroma to God, what a privilege that we have His life and live through Him. Amen.
Thank You Jesus for dying for me [humbled]
He is the only One for me.

Praise the Lord that by His precious blood, we become His many sons.. I appreciated this song very much since it touched me always on how much the Lord love us that He gave His whole being and now we still can apply the efficacy of His blood. AMEN!
Always a favorite.
Thank You, Lord Jesus for dying for us. Oh Lord Jesus You're matchless, You're priceless...You're everything to us, Lord... Oh Lord Jesus we love You.
O Lord Jesus! I love You! Thank You for dying for me! You're matchless, You're priceless!
